thread.title: Anne Hathaway announces The Devil Wears Prada 2, teaser reunites her with Meryl Streep after nearly 20 years - Bollywood Hungama
thread.title_full: Anne Hathaway announces The Devil Wears Prada 2, teaser reunites her with Meryl Streep after nearly 20 years - Bollywood Hungama

author: Bollywood Hungama
title: Anne Hathaway announces The Devil Wears Prada 2, teaser reunites her with Meryl Streep after nearly 20 years - Bollywood Hungama
text:
Anne Hathaway recently delighted fans by posting an Instagram reel that announced the much-anticipated sequel to the iconic film, The Devil Wears Prada. Accompanied by a playful caption, “It’s everyone’s birthday #43 #DWP2,” Hathaway's post has sparked widespread excitement and nostalgia among fans of the original movie, released nearly 20 years ago.
Anne Hathaway announces The Devil Wears Prada 2, teaser reunites her with Meryl Streep after nearly 20 yearsThe original film, which premiered in 2006, became a cultural phenomenon, thanks in large part to the unforgettable performances by Meryl Streep as Miranda Priestly and Anne Hathaway as Andy Sachs. The teaser for The Devil Wears Prada 2 released recently, brings back this iconic duo, reuniting them for a fresh story set in the glitzy and tumultuous world of high fashion.
View this post on Instagram
In addition to Hathaway and Streep, the sequel will also feature Emily Blunt and Stanley Tucci in key roles, promising to deliver the same captivating drama and stylish flair that made the original a classic. The teaser trailer, shared by 20th Century Studios on YouTube, revisits memorable moments from the first film, building anticipation for what fans have been eagerly waiting for over two decades.
The Devil Wears Prada 2 is set to hit theatres on May 1, 2026, and promises to capture the evolution of the fashion world, with the characters adapting to the challenges of the digital age. Fans can look forward to seeing Miranda Priestly and Andy Sachs navigate new power dynamics and fashion industry upheavals, alongside a fresh and glamorous storyline.
Anne Hathaway’s Instagram post thus marks a celebratory moment not only for her 43rd birthday but also for the return of a beloved franchise that continues to captivate audiences with its blend of wit, fashion, and emotional depth. This reunion of stars and characters is undoubtedly one of the most exciting film events of 2026, rekindling the magic of a timeless fashion saga.
